title: Ex-Pro Marlon Pérez, Key Figure in Rigoberto Urán’s Career, Dies After Knife Attack
content:
Colombian cycling community mourns the death of national time trial champion and mentor to modern generation of riders.

Read the full article at Ex-Pro Marlon Pérez, Key Figure in Rigoberto Urán’s Career, Dies After Knife Attack on Velo.
author: ahood
